titles.title: We Shall Lift Up Our Voice

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We shall lift up our voice.
We shall cry with joy.
We shall shout aloud and be free.
We shall glorify the name of the Lord.
We're the blood-bought,
The church, the redeemed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O, lift up your voice,
Ye islands of the sea.
Every created being, fold your wings.
There's a new song being sung with a new melody.
We're the blood-bought,
The church, the redeemed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And we are in that army of the Lord.
We're being washed in the blood,
And we are going forth.
There's nothing that can stop
This mighty moving force
With a shout of praise and a two-edged sword.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Every strong-hold of bondage
Must fall beneath our feet.
Every prisoner held captive must be free.
Our deliverance has come
Through the power of the Son.
We're the blood-bought,
The church, the redeemed.
